entry.title: Blat! Prototype
entry.content:
Blat!

I picked up a pair of bimodal exhaust for my Holden Commodore recently… However, as I have a VE model, there is no built in controller, so I could do what everyone else does and just wire up some buttons to a micro and call it a day. This does not suite me, I want a dynamic option too… So thats where Blat! comes in…

Requirements

  • Dynamic reading of car stats.
  • Low power draw
  • Output signal for exhaust valves must be 10v
  • Button to change modes

Prototype

To come…

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
First things first

This is my first blog type ish thing… I am not the biggest social media user but hey, we will see how this goes… I will soon setup an email so people can contact me if they want to, but at the moment nothing will do :)
This was mainly created for my own sanity so I can ‘remember’ projects I have done and ‘reflect’ on them…
